sentences.en: A man in a crash helmet was mounting a motorbike.
sentences.cn: 一位戴头盔的男子正跨上摩托车。

sentences.en: Can i show you my helmet?
sentences.cn: 楼上，我能向你展示我的头盔吗？

sentences.en: He donned work clothes and a wicker helmet.
sentences.cn: 他穿上工作服,戴上柳条帽.

sentences.en: He pulled on a battered old crash helmet with a scratched visor.
sentences.cn: 他戴上了一顶破旧的防护头盔，上面的面罩已有划痕。

sentences.en: He returned to Eagle and removed his helmet in the repressurized cabin.
sentences.cn: 他回到鹰号在增压舱摘除宇航帽.

sentences.en: His helmet kept coruscating.
sentences.cn: 他的钢盔在闪闪发光。

sentences.en: Instead, he was told the last time that she loved him, got a hug from her, put his helmet on her so that she can live, and die himself...
sentences.cn: 相反，他叫女孩最后一次说她爱他，最后一次拥抱他，并让她戴上自己的头盔，因而，女孩可以幸免于难，而他自己却离开了人世……

sentences.en: It was so strange to see a policeman lying down, without his helmet.
sentences.cn: 看到一位警察没戴头盔躺着很奇怪。

sentences.en: Miners wore a helmet as a guard against falling rocks.
sentences.cn: 矿工头戴钢盔,防护落下的岩石.

sentences.en: Minetta collected his rifle and helmet from the hospital supply sergeant.
sentences.cn: 米尼塔向医院的后勤中士领回了枪和钢盔.

sentences.en: Put on a helmet, fire up your engine and head out on the open road.
sentences.cn: 戴上头盔，发动引擎，开上乡村干道。

sentences.en: The bullet glanced off his helmet.
sentences.cn: 那颗子弹掠过他的头盔。

sentences.en: The plaintiff was guilty of contributory negligence for failing to wear a crash helmet.
sentences.cn: 原告因未戴安全头盔而负有连带责任.

sentences.en: The resins were used to turn out millions of helmet liners.
sentences.cn: 用这类树脂生产了成百万只钢盔内衬.

sentences.en: The Sword split the Knight's helmet and bit him fatally.
sentences.cn: 剑劈开了骑士的头盔并致命地刺进他。

sentences.en: They geared the deep - sea diver with helmet, suit and air nose.
sentences.cn: 他们给 深海 潜水员配备了防护帽 、 潜水服和通气管.

sentences.en: They now face the prospect of having to wear a cycling helmet by law.
sentences.cn: 他们现在面临的情形是：不久将需要依法佩戴摩托车头盔。

sentences.en: Through the basement window I saw him strap on his pink cycling helmet.
sentences.cn: 透过地下室的窗户，我看到他正在把他那粉色的自行车头盔系在头上。

sentences.en: Wear your safety helmet when you go down. Don't take any risks.
sentences.cn: 戴上安全帽再下去, 不要冒险.

sentences.en: What you definitely need: helmet, appropriate clothing, phone, passport (with visas), water and snacks.
sentences.cn: 必需品：头盔，适量的衣物，电话，护照和签证，水和点心。

sentences.en: Without Christ we are defenseless against the Devil, but with "the helmet of salvation" our minds are protected by God.
sentences.cn: 没有基督，我们无力防御魔鬼的攻击；但有救恩的头盔，我们的心思便有神的保护。

phrases.tran_cn: 安全帽；（飞行员，摩托车驾驶员等的）防撞头盔

trans.tran_en: a strong hard hat that soldiers,  motorcycle  riders, the police etc wear to protect their heads
